mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Department Reports from October 1938 to June 1940
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandums of the monthly reports sent to the town manager from October 1938 to June 1940, listing out the statistics such as the total amount of emergencies answered and property loss as well as its cost, etc., includes a newspaper clipping attachment.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
